about.title: About me
about.description:
I specialize in web development and modern applications, creating scalable, efficient solutions focused on user experience.

Currently, I am studying Systems Engineering and constantly deepening my knowledge in Artificial Intelligence, applying it to automate processes and build smarter and more efficient digital products.

stats.label: FOCUS ON QUALITY AND BEST PRACTICES

items.title: Frontend React Developer
items.description:
Responsibilities:

● Actively participate in the entire product development cycle, from requirement gathering to implementation and testing, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams under the SCRUM agile methodology and fostering clear, result-oriented communication.
● Develop e-commerce stores on platforms like VTEX and Shopify, using React, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Sass, and GraphQL.
● Customize native components and develop modules from scratch in VTEX; in Shopify, adapt themes using Liquid and implement functional improvements to optimize user experience.

Achievements:

● Optimized performance, accessibility, and SEO in VTEX stores such as Enrutalo, Bsoul, and Uniandes, applying semantic structure practices, meta-tag optimization, URL cleanup, and efficient loading strategies, achieving a 40% increase in loading speed and substantial improvements in Lighthouse metrics.
● Improved user experience in the Juan Valdez store by resolving a product duplication issue with attachments in the minicart.
● Implemented precise validation of data sent to the cart, allowing users to adjust quantities without generating duplicates, resulting in a smoother checkout process and a 20% increase in conversions.

items.title: Software Developer
